description: The poached chicken in this recipe has an incredibly silky texture and is very tender. You can add extras to the soup at the end, such as Asian greens, noodles, shrimps, or crunchy beansprouts.
name: Malaysian Chicken Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the skin from the chicken and discard, then remove all the meat from the bones. Strain the broth from the pan into a clean heavy-based pan, add the chicken meat, and stir in the soy sauce and fish sauce. Top up with some stock, if necessary, then simmer gently to warm through, taste, and season as required. Ladle into warmed Asian soup bowls and garnish with spring onions.
